channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- PLC5
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- PLC5

item.title: CVE-2010-5305|2024-08-07T04:17:10.399Z -- rockwell%20automation -- plc5
item.description: The potential exists for exposure of the product's password used to restrict unauthorized access to Rockwell PLC5/SLC5/0x/RSLogix 1785-Lx and 1747-L5x controllers. The potential exists for an unauthorized programming and configuration client to gain access to the product and allow changes to the productâ€™s configuration or program. When applicable, upgrade product firmware to a version that includes enhanced security functionality compatible with Rockwell Automation's FactoryTalk Security services.
